metadata.title: Is It OK to Bring Other Circuit Close to the Electrode?

sections.content:
Question:
Are there any reference materials available for laying out other signal lines around electrodes and wiring?
Answer:
We recommend not to place other signal patterns on the back of the electrode pattern.
For more information, refer to "2.4.2 Wiring" in the Application Note "Capacitive Sensor Microcontrollers CTSU Capacitive Touch Electrode Design Guide (R30AN0389)".
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
